roleset.name: ruin, rule out
roleset.note: SCOTCH-V NOTES: Sad to say, this is related to the ethnicity. No Vncls. (from scotch.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: The head of the DEA at the time, John Ingersoll, scotched the assassination plan.
example.arg: The head of the DEA at the time, John Ingersoll,
